dc_title_s: The lesson of the war map
dc_description_s: Compares the amount of territory occupied by the Allies versus that of the Central Powers.; In lower margin: If it is indeed true that the map is the test of Germany's success, then Germany has already irrevocably lost the war.; Includes additional text.|22 x 30 centimeters, sheet 35 x 69 centimeters|Scale not given.|General Map Collection
